title: #116: Gaslight Nation
description:
There is an old saying “I’ll believe it when I see it”, but in America, in 2021 the powers that be would prefer it if you didn’t believe anything even when you do see it with your own eyes.

The Mainstream Media is in the disinformation and narrative building industry, not the news business. They aspire to reach Orwell’s Ministry of Truth status where they can lie with impunity, convince people that 2+2=5, and “memory hole” any information that conflicts with their warped ideology.

The biggest problem these days is that the general public has outsourced their critical thinking to these very institutions, so even when they are presented with clear and obvious information that contradicts the media narrative they just can’t muster an original or logical thought.
